record.field: Renovation work at the YourCompany headquarters.
Designing and construction of an appealing, comfortable, safe and well-built home that fits the needs and wants of you and your family.
Installation of acoustic ceiling clouds and wall panels.
Modifications to the kitchen of the lunch room
Hello Admin, Can we discuss this? Having nicer chairs for managers doesn't sit right with me.
We have already discussed, and I stand by my decision.
Hello Demo, There is a change in customer requirement. Can you check the document from customer again. Thanks,
Ok, I have checked the mail, I will update the document and let you know.
Fine! Send it ASAP, its urgent.
The elevator's state leaves much to be desired on many levels, we might need to take steps to repair it.
This is not very uplifting, it would probably raise the expenses by a lot.
I know, it's driving me up the wall.
Repaint the walls with the hex color #0FF1CE
Buy a gift for Marc Demo's birthday
Select a thoughtful gift for Marc Demo's birthday .
Perform a replacement of the left screen cable to address any issues with connectivity or display quality.
Join the scheduled project status meeting to provide updates, discuss progress, and align with team members.
Spend time going through inbox, reviewing and replying to important emails to stay organized and maintain communication.
Take a few minutes to empty and replace the trash bins in the office. Keeping living space clean and odor-free.
Conduct a training session to enhance team members proficiency and productivity.
Take a comprehensive look at finances, including budgeting, savings, and investments.
Conduct thorough research on various investment options to make informed decisions about growing your financial portfolio.
Explore various charitable organizations and opportunities to contribute to meaningful causes and make a positive impact on the community.
Participate in a local event to connect with the community
Thoroughly review and provide feedback on an important document.
Facilitate a team discussion to encourage idea sharing and decision-making.
Participate in a training session or workshop to develop new skills or gain knowledge relevant to your work.
Attend a meeting to review documents, proposals, or reports and provide constructive feedback.
Join a meeting where the team reviews and discusses the design or user experience aspects of a project.
Present findings from research you conducted to inform a project or decision.

value.eval: obj().env['mail.message'].search([ ('subtype_id', '=', ref('project.mt_task_new')), ('res_id', 'in', [ ref('project.project_1_task_1'), ref('project.project_1_task_2'), ref('project.project_1_task_3'), ref('project.project_1_task_4'), ref('project.project_1_task_5'), ref('project.project_1_task_6'), ref('project.project_1_task_7'), ref('project.project_1_task_8'), ref('project.project_1_task_9'), ref('project.project_2_task_1'), ref('project.project_2_task_2'), ref('project.project_2_task_3'), ref('project.project_2_task_4'), ref('project.project_2_task_5'), ref('project.project_2_task_6'), ref('project.project_2_task_7'), ref('project.project_2_task_8'), ref('project.project_3_task_2'), ]), ]).ids

function.name: rating_apply
function.eval: ([ref('project.project_1_task_4')], 5, 'PROJECT_3', None, 'Exactly what I asked for, thank you!')

function.name: rating_apply
function.eval: ([ref('project.project_1_task_2')], 1, 'PROJECT_4', None, 'There must have been some miscomunication, because the result is not quite what I had in mind. I would like to request some modifications.')

record.field: Review Mark as Important Emails First
